references.paper_title: OKG: On-the-fly keyword generation in sponsored search advertising
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel method for ad text generation that is tailored specifically for ad text generation tasks and easily generalizable to ad headlines with minimal prompt redefinition.

references.paper_title: Self-refine: Iteratively improving text via self-feedback
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel self-refinement method for improving text quality through iterative feedback, which is a key aspect in improving the quality of the generated text and is discussed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of chain-of-thought prompting, which is a significant advancement in prompting techniques that allows for more complex reasoning and is discussed as a baseline for generating responses.

references.paper_title: Comm: Collaborative multi-agent, multi-reasoning-path prompting for complex problem solving
references.reason: This paper introduces a collaborative multi-agent prompting framework, which is highly relevant to the current paper's focus on collaborative multi-agent systems.
This paper introduces the MMLU benchmark, which is used as a primary dataset for evaluating the performance of the proposed method and is a crucial part of the experimental setup
